title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.6 - Discovery
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.6 - Discovery

State Regulations

Discovery is available to respondents and applicants to the
extent permitted by the State Administrative Procedure Act sections 301.2, 305, and 401.4. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
2.6

Adopted

New

York State Register March 25, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 12, eff. 3/25/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
